titles.title: A bill to designate the building to be constructed at 2566 Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, New York, as the "Walter Edward Grady United States Post Office".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/26/1988--Introduced. Designates the building to be constructed at 2566 Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, New York, as the Walter Edward Grady United States Post Office.
